header.title: Amathuluzi eSalatiso e-OHS
sidebar.step_0.title: ðŸ“œ Wamukelekile kumaThuluzi eSalatiso e-OHS
sidebar.step_0.description: Hlola amathuluzi ethu aphelele kanye nezinsiza zokuthuthukisa ukuphepha kwezempilo emsebenzini wakho.
sidebar.step_0.fun_fact: âš¡ Ngabe uyazi ukuthi ukusebenzisa abahlinzeki abanobuqotho abanokuthi benciphise izingozi emsebenzini ngokuqinisekisa ukuthi umsebenzi wenziwe ngesikhathi futhi ngokwezinga eliphezulu kanye nezindinganiso zokuphepha?
intro.title: Wamukelekile kumaThuluzi eSalatiso e-OHS
intro.description: Hlola amathuluzi ethu aphelele kanye nezinsiza zokuthuthukisa ukuphepha kwezempilo emsebenzini wakho.
legal_obligations.client.title: Izibopho Zomthengi
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_a: Construction Regulation 5(1)(a): Lungiselela Ukuhlola Ingozi Yokuqala (BRA) ekhomba izingozi zeprojekthi.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_b: Construction Regulation 5(1)(b): Hlinzeka Ngezingcazelo Zezempilo Nokuphepha ezichaza izidingo ezithile zeprojekthi.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_l: Construction Regulation 5(1)(l): Yamukela Isicwangciso Sokuqashwa Sezempilo Nokuphepha ngaphambi kokuthi umsebenzi uqale.
legal_obligations.contractor.title: Izibopho Zomsebenzi
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_a: Construction Regulation 7(1)(a): Thumela Isicwangciso Sezempilo Nokuphepha esisekelwe ezingcazelweni zomthengi.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_b: Construction Regulation 7(1)(b): Gcina Ifayela Yezempilo Nokuphepha endaweni enazo zonke izincwadi ezidingekayo.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9: Construction Regulation 9: Hlola izingozi kanye Nokuhlola Ingozi Yokuqashwa (HIRA) ngokukhethekile emsebenzini.
legal_obligations.professional.title: Izibopho Zochwepheshe we-H&S
legal_obligations.professional.reg_5_5: Construction Regulation 5(5): Ama-Arhente (PrCHSA) aphethe i-H&S egameni lomthengi, eqinisekisa ukuthotyelwa.
legal_obligations.professional.reg_8_5: Construction Regulation 8(5): Amagosa (CHSO) asiza abasebenzi ekusebenziseni naseku-oditheni izinhlelo ze-H&S.
legal_obligations.professional.sacpcmp: Imihlahlandlela ye-SACPCMP: Kufanele igcine ukubhalisa kanye nezidingo ze-CPD zezikhundla zobungcweti.
wizard.step_0: Sicela ukhethe isenzo ukuze uqale inqubo.
wizard.step_1.title: Isinyathelo 1 kwezi-9: Ufuna ukwenza ini?
wizard.step_1.label: Khetha Amaxwebhu oza Kuwahlanganisa (Khetha konke okusebenzayo):
wizard.step_1.error: Sicela ukhethe okungenani uxwebhu olulodwa lokuhlanganisa.

wizard.step_2.client_contact_role_error: Sicela ufake indima yomuntu oxhumana nomthengi.

wizard.step_8.specify_error: Sicela uchaze ukuthi uxwebhu luhlanganiselwe bani.
wizard.step_9.title: Isinyathelo 9 kwezi-9: Buyekeza futhi Yongeza Esitolo
wizard.step_9.description: Buyekeza okukhethiwe futhi yongeza amaxwebhu esitolo sakho ukuze uqhubeke.
cart.title: Isitolo Sakho
cart.invoice_reference: Inombolo Yesithenjwa Se-invoice: (Ivumelekile izinsuku eziyi-7. Bhalisa ukuze ugcine ngokungapheli!)
resources.title: Xhumana Nochwepheshe be-H&S Abavunyelwe
resources.description: Ngabe udinga usizo lochwepheshe? Xhumana nochwepheshe abavunyelwe ngezidingo zeprojekthi yakho.

footer.newsletter.title: Hlala Uhlaziyekile
chatbot.response: Ngilapha ukuze ngikusize! Ukuze uthole iseluleko se-OHS esiqondene nawe, sicela uxhumane nochwepheshe.
training.title: Ukuqeqesha Okuphelele Kwendawo Yomsebenzi
training.description: Hlola izinhlelo zethu zokuqeqesha eziphelele zendawo yomsebenzi ukuze uqinisekise ukuthotyelwa kwemithetho yaseNingizimu Afrika ye-OHS futhi ukhuthaze indawo yokusebenza ephephile. Khetha ukuqeqesha okusebenzayo, ukuqeqesha kweqembu, noma sebenzisa i-wizard yethu ukuze uthole iziphakamiso ezilungiselelwe wena ngokusekelwe embonini yakho, abalaleli abajolisiwe, kanye nendawo.
training.wizard.start: Sicela ukhethe okukhethwa ukuze uqale inqubo yesiphakamiso sokuqeqesha.
training.wizard.step_1.title: Isinyathelo 1 kwezi-5: Khetha Imboni Yakho
training.wizard.step_1.label: Imboni:
training.wizard.step_2.title: Isinyathelo 2 kwezi-5: Khetha Abalaleli Abajolisiwe
training.wizard.step_2.label: Abalaleli Abajolisiwe (Khetha konke okusebenzayo):
training.wizard.step_2.error: Sicela ukhethe okungenani abalaleli abajolisiwe abanye.
training.wizard.step_2.option_emergency_: Iqembu Lokuqala Lokusiza (Abanikezeli Boncedo Lokuqala, Abacimi Bomillo)
training.wizard.step_3.title: Isinyathelo 3 kwezi-5: Chaza Indawo Yakho
training.wizard.step_4.title: Isinyathelo 4 kwezi-5: Izindlela Ezongezelelweyo
training.wizard.step_5.title: Isinyathelo 5 kwezi-5: Buyekeza Ukuqeqesha Okunconyiwe
training.wizard.step_5.description: Ngokusekelwe ekufakeni kwakho, nazi izinhlelo zokuqeqesha ezinconyiwe. Khetha lezo ofuna ukuzifaka esitolweni sakho.
training.cart.title: Isitolo Sakho Sokuqeqesha
training.cart.customization.title: Lungiselela Izinsiza Zakho Zokuqeqesha
training.cart.customization.first_aider_: Sicela ufake igama lomuntu onikeza uncedo lokuqala.
training.cart.customization.emergency_li: Sicela ufake inombolo yoxhumana ngesimo esiphuthumayo evumelekile (isb., +27123456789).
training.cart.compiled_by.title: Ihlanganiswe ngu
training.cart.training_type.title: Indlela Yokuqeqesha
training.cart.training_type.label: Khetha Indlela Yokulethwa:
training.cart.checkout.disclaimer: Isaziso se-SafetyHelp: Izinsiza zokuqeqesha ezinikeziwe zenzelwe ukusiza kuphela futhi azibonisi iseluleko sochwepheshe. Ukuze uthole izisombululo ze-OHS ezilungiselelwe wena, xhumana ne-SafetyHelp ku support@safetyhelp.co.za noma uvakashele Ikhasi Loxhumana Naye.
training.checkout.success: Ukukhokha kuphumelele! Izinsiza zakho zokuqeqesha zenziwe. Landela ii-PDF zakho ngezansi. Ukuze uthole ukuqeqesha kwi-intanethi, amakhodi okungena athunyelwe kuwe nge-imeyili.
training.providers.title: Abahlinzeki Bokuqeqesha Abavunyelwe
training.providers.description: Ngabe udinga ukuqeqesha lomuntu? Xhumana nabahlinzeki bokuqeqesha abavunyelwe ngezidingo zakho.
training.providers.provider_1: ABC Training Solutions - Ivunyelwe yi-SETA - Igxile kuNcedo Lokuqala, Ukucima Umlilo - Oxhumana Naye: info@abctraining.co.za
training.providers.provider_2: SafeSkills Academy - Ibhaliswe kwi-SACPCMP - Igxile kuKuphepha Kokwakha - Oxhumana Naye: training@safeskills.co.za
training.providers.provider_3: SafetyHelp Training - Ukuqeqesha Okuphelele kwe-OHS - Oxhumana Naye: support@safetyhelp.co.za
training.manual.purchase.title: Thenga Imanuwali Yokuqeqesha Elungisekayo
training.manual.purchase.description: Thola imanuwali yokuqeqesha ephelele elungiselelwe inkampani yakho, ehlanganisa izidingo zomthetho, okuqukethwe okukhethekile kwenkampani ngokusekelwe kweprofayili yakho yengozi, kanye nezilinganiso ezivela kubahlinzeki bokuqeqesha abavunyelwe.
training.manual.risk_profile.title: Chaza Iprofayili Yakho Yengozi Yemanuwali Yokuqeqesha
training.manual.risk_profile.label: Iprofayili Yengozi:
training.selection_method.title: Khetha Indlela Yakho Yokuqeqesha

training.list.search_placeholder.training.legal_fact.step_1: Iqiniso Lomthetho: UMthetho we-OHS Umhlathi 8 udinga ukuthi abaqashi banikeze ukuqeqesha okulungiselelwe izingozi ezithile zendawo yokusebenza.
training.list.search_placeholder.training.fun_fact.step_2: Iqiniso Elimnandi: Ngabe uyazi ukuthi ukuqeqesha okuvamile kunganciphisa izigameko zendawo yokusebenza ngokufika ku-30%?
training.list.search_placeholder.training.legal_fact.step_3: Iqiniso Lomthetho: Omasipala bendawo bangaba nemithetho ye-OHS ehlukahlukene ethinta izidingo zokuqeqesha.
training.list.search_placeholder.training.fun_fact.step_4: Iqiniso Elimnandi: Izindawo zokusebenza ezinengozi ephezulu njengeziza zokwakha zidinga ukuqeqesha okuvamile ukuze kugcinwe izindinganiso zokuphepha.
training.list.search_placeholder.training.legal_fact.step_5: Iqiniso Lomthetho: UMthetho we-OHS uyayalela ukuqeqesha okuthile kwezindima ezifana nabameleli be-SHE ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthotyelwa.
training.list.search_placeholder.legislation.title: Umthetho we-OHS kanye Nokuphatha Ingozi
training.list.search_placeholder.legislation.description: Yenza umthetho we-OHS kanye nesicwangciso sokuphatha ingozi esilungiselelwe ibhizinisi lakho. Faka imininingwane yenkampani yakho, imisebenzi, kanye nezingozi ukuze uthole umbiko ophelele wokuthotyelwa ohlanganisa umthetho waseNingizimu Afrika, imithetho kamasipala, kanye nezindinganiso zamazwe ngamazwe.
training.list.search_placeholder.legislation.wizard.title: Yenza I-RMP Yakho
training.list.search_placeholder.legislation.wizard.step_1.title: Isinyathelo 1 kwezi-4: Imininingwane Yenkampani
training.list.search_placeholder.legislation.wizard.step_2.title: Isinyathelo 2 kwezi-4: Imisebenzi
training.list.search_placeholder.legislation.wizard.step_2.label: Khetha Imisebenzi (Khetha konke okusebenzayo):
training.list.search_placeholder.legislation.wizard.step_3.title: Isinyathelo 3 kwezi-4: Izingozi
training.list.search_placeholder.legislation.wizard.step_3.label: Khetha Izingozi (Khetha konke okusebenzayo):
training.list.search_placeholder.legislation.wizard.step_4.title: Isinyathelo 4 kwezi-4: Buyekeza futhi Yenza
training.list.search_placeholder.legislation.wizard.step_4.description: Buyekeza okufakiwe futhi yenza i-RMP yakho. Ungangeza umthetho owengeziwe uma udinga.
training.list.search_placeholder.legislation.wizard.step_4.additional_leg: Faka noma yimuphi umthetho owengeziwe lapha...
training.list.search_placeholder.legislation.cart.title: Ukukhokha
training.list.search_placeholder.legislation.cart.description: I-RMP yakho yenziwe! Sebenzisa ikhodi yevawutsha FREERMP2025 ukuze ulande mahhala (abasebenzisi bokuqala abayi-100).
training.list.search_placeholder.suppliers.title: Uhlu Lwabahlinzeki be-OHS
training.list.search_placeholder.suppliers.description: Thola futhi ubeke abahlinzeki be-OHS eNingizimu Afrika. Sesha ngendawo, izinsizakalo, kanye nezitifiketi. Thumela ukubuyekezwa ukuze usize abanye benze izinqumo ezinolwazi.
training.list.search_placeholder.suppliers.list.title: Uhlu Lwabahlinzeki
training.list.search_placeholder.suppliers.table.name: Igama Lomhlinzeki
training.list.search_placeholder.suppliers.review_form.title: Thumela Ukubuyekezwa
training.list.search_placeholder.community_tools.title: Amathuluzi Okuphepha Komphakathi
training.list.search_placeholder.community_tools.description: Bika noma yisiphi isigameko sokuphepha noma ingozi emphakathini wakho noma endaweni yakho yokusebenza, kusukela emigodini kuya ezinsizeni ezinengozi. Sebenzisa amathuluzi ethu ukuqinisekisa ukuphepha ezindaweni ezifana nezitolo ze-spaza, izikole, izibhedlela, kanye nezindawo zokudlela.
training.list.search_placeholder.community_tools.incident_report.title: Bika Isigameko noma Ingozi
training.list.search_placeholder.community_tools.incident_report.descript: Chaza isigameko noma ingozi (isb., umgodi kuMain Street, isihlalo esaphukile esikhungweni somphakathi)...
training.list.search_placeholder.community_tools.incident_report.provider: Faka ucingo noma i-imeyili (izogcwaliswa ngokuzenzekelayo uma umhlinzeki ekhethiwe)...
Isibambiso Sezokuxhumana Somhlinzeki Wensizakalo (Ngokuzikhethela, isb., @CityofJoburgZA ku-X):
Faka isibambiso se-X (sizogcwaliswa ngokuzenzekelayo uma umhlinzeki ekhethiwe)...
training.list.search_placeholder.community_tools.list.title: Amanye Amathuluzi Okuphepha Komphakathi
training.list.search_placeholder.community_tools.list.spaza_shop.title: Uhlu Lokuphepha Lwezitolo Ze-Spaza
training.list.search_placeholder.community_tools.list.spaza_shop.descript: Qinisekisa ukuthi isitolo sakho se-spaza siyahlangabezana nezidingo zokuphepha komlilo, kagesi, kanye nesakhiwo ngokwezindinganiso zomasipala kanye noMthetho we-OHS.
training.list.search_placeholder.community_tools.list.school.title: Umhlahlandlela Wokuphepha Komlilo Wesikole
training.list.search_placeholder.community_tools.list.school.description: Funda izidingo zomthetho zokuphepha komlilo ezikoleni, kuhlanganisa izicwangciso zokukhishwa kanye nezinsiza.
training.list.search_placeholder.community_tools.list.hospital.title: Umhlahlandlela Wokulungiselela Okuphuthumayo Kwesibhedlela
training.list.search_placeholder.community_tools.list.hospital.descriptio: Qinisekisa ukuthi izibhedlela zilungiselele izimo eziphuthumayo ngezicwangciso zokukhishwa ezifanelekile kanye nezinsiza zokuphepha.
training.list.search_placeholder.community_tools.list.tavern.title: Uhlu Lokuphepha Lwendawo Yokudlela
training.list.search_placeholder.community_tools.list.tavern.description: Hlola ukuthi izindawo zokudlela ziyathobela imithetho yokuphepha komlilo kanye nokuphatha izixuku ukuze kuvinjelwe izigameko.
training.list.search_placeholder.dashboard.title: Ideshibhodi Yamalungu
training.list.search_placeholder.dashboard.welcome: Wamukelekile, [Igama Lomsebenzisi]! Phetha ukuthotyelwa kwakho kwe-OHS, ama-RMPs, ukubuyekezwa kwabahlinzeki, kanye nemibiko yomphakathi lapha.
training.list.search_placeholder.dashboard.profile.title: Iprofayili Yenkampani
training.list.search_placeholder.dashboard.rmps.title: Ama-RMPs Agciniwe
training.list.search_placeholder.dashboard.supplier_reviews.title: Ukubuyekezwa Kwabahlinzeki
training.list.search_placeholder.dashboard.incident_reports.title: Imibiko Yezigameko
training.list.search_placeholder.document_categories.title: Hlanganisa Amaxwebhu Enkqubo Yakho Yokuphatha i-OHS
training.list.search_placeholder.document_categories.description: Khetha futhi uhlanganise amaxwebhu ozowadinga enkqubo yakho yokuphatha i-OHS. Khetha emigaqweni, ezinkqubweni, ezindinganisweni, nokunye, okulungiselelwe izidingo zenhlangano yakho.
training.list.search_placeholder.document_categories.policies.title: Imigaqo
training.list.search_placeholder.document_categories.policies.description: Izitatimende zenhloso ephezulu kanye nokuzibophezela, ezivunyelwe ngabaphathi abaphezulu.
training.list.search_placeholder.document_categories.policies.workplace_v: Umgaqo Wobudlova kanye Nokuhlukumeza Endaweni Yomsebenzi
training.list.search_placeholder.document_categories.policies.infectious_: Umgaqo Wokuphendula Kwe-COVID-19 noma Isifo Esithelelanayo
training.list.search_placeholder.document_categories.policies.ohs_perform: Umgaqo Wokusebenza, Ukubuyekezwa, kanye Nezinjongo ze-OHS
training.list.search_placeholder.document_categories.policies.ohs_communi: Umgaqo Wokuxhumana, Ukubamba Iqhaza, kanye Nokubonisana kwe-OHS
training.list.search_placeholder.document_categories.policies.ohs_workpla: Umgaqo Wezempilo kanye Nentlalontle Yendawo Yomsebenzi ye-OHS

training.list.search_placeholder.document_categories.procedures.title: Izinqubo
training.list.search_placeholder.document_categories.procedures.descripti: Imihlahlandlela yesinyathelo ngesinyathelo yokwenza imisebenzi ngokuphepha nangokungaguquki.
training.list.search_placeholder.document_categories.procedures.first_aid: Inqubo Yoncedo Lokuqala kanye Nesimo Esiphuthumayo Sezempilo
training.list.search_placeholder.document_categories.standards.title: Izindinganiso/Imihlahlandlela
training.list.search_placeholder.document_categories.standards.descriptio: Izindinganiso zangaphakathi ezihambisana nomthetho noma izindinganiso zemboni, ezichaza izimo ezilindelekile noma ukuziphatha.
training.list.search_placeholder.document_categories.standards.housekeepi: Isindinganiso Sokugcina Indawo kanye Nokuphatha Imfucumfucu
training.list.search_placeholder.document_categories.standards.noise_vent: Isindinganiso Somsindo, Ukungenisa Umoya, kanye Nokukhanyisa
training.list.search_placeholder.document_categories.standards.hygiene_fa: Isindinganiso Sendawo Yenhlanzeko (izindlu zangasese, amanzi, izindawo zokuphumula)

training.list.search_placeholder.document_categories.standards.ohs_workpl: Isindinganiso Sezempilo kanye Nentlalontle Yendawo Yomsebenzi ye-OHS
training.list.search_placeholder.document_categories.standards.ohs_docume: Isindinganiso Sokuphatha Amaxwebhu kanye Nezirekhodi ze-OHS
training.list.search_placeholder.document_categories.registers_logs.title: Amarejista kanye Namalogi
training.list.search_placeholder.document_categories.registers_logs.descr: Izirekhodi ezibuyekezwa njalo zokulandela umkhondo kanye nokulandeleka.
training.list.search_placeholder.document_categories.templates_forms.desc: Amaxwebhu alungiswe kwangaphambili ukuze kuqoqwe futhi kuhlanganiswe ulwazi.

training.list.search_placeholder.document_categories.permits.description: Izimvume ezilawulwayo zemisebenzi enengozi ephezulu noma evinjiwe.

training.list.search_placeholder.document_categories.records.description: Amaxwebhu agqityiwe abonisa ukusetshenziswa kanye nokuthotyelwa.
